sentences.cn: 后来对英国政治产生重大影响的一个协议

sentences.en: An apple tree, after going through a long time ramification and sprouting, finally fruited.
sentences.cn: 一棵苹果树经过漫长的分枝, 抽叶终于结果了.

sentences.en: Exterior activator is ramification of emulsifying agent, dust - proofing agent, hydrous lanolin.
sentences.cn: 表面活性剂是乳化剂 、 防尘 剂 、 含水羊毛脂衍生物.

sentences.en: How do cure the urine ramification?
Ingredients: oxygen active agent, aloe extract, vitamin C ramification, vitamin E, sunscreen factor etc.

sentences.en: Main compositions: Pomegranate, Aloe, Sun blocking elemental complex, White lily extract, Quiet type VC ramification.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the effect of naftopidil ramification - BWYJ, on the platelet aggregation of rabbit.
sentences.cn: 目的观察萘哌地尔衍生物( BWYJ )对家兔体外血小板聚集率的影响.

sentences.en: Objective To optimize the reaction condition of 2 - mercaptobenzothiaozole ramification.
sentences.cn: 目的:探索出在咪唑啉酮2号位引入2-巯基苯骈噻唑的适宜反应条件.

sentences.en: Public relation of police is a ramification of modern public relations.
sentences.cn: 警察公共关系是现代公共关系的衍生物.
